name: baba-jan-server
description: Baba Jan Server is a backend application designed for a web store specializing in fruits and vegetables. This Node.js-based server provides a robust, modular, and scalable infrastructure to manage all aspects of the store, including items, orders, user accounts, promotions, notifications, and admin functionalities. The server ensures seamless integration with Telegram for real-time updates and notifications and offers payment options, analytics, and a user-friendly admin panel.
